name: Swinging Over It with Alin Lucian (itch)
name_original: Swinging Over It with Alin Lucian (itch)
description:
--------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------- ABOUT THE GAME

You are a dice that can swing using a rope. The game is not normal,

the concept is not normal but, it is fun.

Using that rope, you have to get over the obstacles,

 to help the little dice to go home.

You need more reasons to play it?
